statements: UPDATE instrument_repairs SET repair_cost = 300.50, repair_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE instrument_id = 1;

UPDATE RepairOptions SET estimated_cost = 500.00, repair_description = 'Replace damaged parts' WHERE repair_option_id = 301;
